source_quote: A 'healthy' Buy-Day when in a bullish scenario we see London Session forming a low of the day between 2:00 am & 5:00 am NY time

signature.condition: IF London Session forms a low of the day between 2:00 am & 5:00 am NY time in a bullish scenario
signature.action: THEN expect NY session to be either a continuation with another Juda Swing between 7:00 am & 11:00 am NY time after a pullback

source_quote: Sometimes we will see a NY session reversal profile – when price reaches the main Higher TF target / POI until NY session open

signature.condition: IF price reaches the main Higher TF target / POI until NY session open
signature.action: THEN expect NY session reversal profile with two Juda Swing reversal scenarios
signature.drawer_basis: Relates to higher timeframe bias and objectives

source_quote: price runs the liquidity INTO PDA, and reverses from there

signature.condition: IF price runs liquidity INTO PDA (Premium/Discount Array)
signature.action: THEN expect reversal from that point

source_quote: if the Juda happens in LOKZ or NYOKZ, you know the Higher TF orderflow, you have a clear target for the day

signature.condition: IF Juda happens in LOKZ or NYOKZ with clear Higher TF orderflow
signature.action: THEN wait for price to break structure and ride the wave

source_quote: Clear run on a Liquidity Pool... How sharply price reverses and bounces back

signature.condition: IF there is a clear run on a Liquidity Pool during Juda Swing
signature.action: THEN expect sharp reversal and bounce back
signature.drawer_basis: Describes confirmation criteria for the pattern
